column1: Has the founder held a leadership role in a technology company?
Did the founder complete postgraduate education?
Has the founder previously co-founded a company?
Has the founder's previous startup resulted in an acquisition?
Does the founder have experience in the financial services sector?
Has the founder worked full-time at a large number of companies?
Is the founder based in California?
Does the founder have a background in healthcare?
Has the founder served in a C-level role at a public company?
Is the founder recognized for thought leadership and public speaking?
